cms.notificationemail.NotificationEmailContent:
Hi {{UserName}},
you've requested a reset of your account's multi-factor authentication (MFA) secret key.

Use the following link to set up your MFA: Click here

Note that passcodes generated by your previous MFA authenticator will no longer work.
cms.notificationemail.NotificationEmailSubject: MFA secret key reset request from {{ServiceDomain}}
